findings.title: Potential Reentrancy
findings.description: External call executes before storage write. If the callee re-enters, contract state may be manipulated before completion. Risk amplifiers detected: external calls use dynamic or over-privileged call flags.
findings.recommendation: Apply checks-effects-interactions ordering and explicit reentrancy lock for methods performing external calls.
findings.confidence_reason: Path uncertainty calibration applied: constraints=1, avg_complexity=5.00, peak_complexity=5, uncertainty=0.260, penalty=0.065, confidence 0.900->0.835.

findings.title: Missing Access Control
findings.description: Sensitive operations execute without Runtime.CheckWitness or equivalent guard.
findings.recommendation: Enforce authorization for state-changing and privileged methods.
findings.confidence_reason: Path uncertainty calibration retained baseline confidence 0.850; no symbolic constraints were observed.

findings.title: Unchecked Arithmetic Operation
findings.description: Operation ADD may overflow or underflow without runtime guard.
findings.recommendation: Validate arithmetic bounds or assert invariants before state updates.
findings.confidence_reason: Path uncertainty calibration applied: constraints=1, avg_complexity=5.00, peak_complexity=5, uncertainty=0.260, penalty=0.065, confidence 0.800->0.735.

findings.title: Over-Privileged External Call Flags
findings.description: External call uses CallFlags.All (0x0F), enabling full callee capabilities.
findings.recommendation: Reduce call flags to the minimum required permissions (least privilege).
findings.confidence_reason: Path uncertainty calibration applied: constraints=1, avg_complexity=5.00, peak_complexity=5, uncertainty=0.260, penalty=0.065, confidence 0.850->0.785.

findings.title: Unchecked External Call Return Value
findings.description: Result of external call 'CALLT:serialize' is not validated before continuing.
findings.recommendation: Check return values and revert/abort on failure.
findings.confidence_reason: Path uncertainty calibration applied: constraints=1, avg_complexity=5.00, peak_complexity=5, uncertainty=0.260, penalty=0.065, confidence 0.700->0.635.

findings.title: High GAS Consumption Path
findings.description: Execution path consumes approximately 65582 gas units.
findings.recommendation: Reduce expensive syscalls/loops and split heavy workflows.
findings.confidence_reason: Path uncertainty calibration retained baseline confidence 0.700; no symbolic constraints were observed.
